## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armunwindopasm-cpp-/unwindopcodestreamer">UnwindOpcodeStreamer</a> - The simple wrapper over <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector</a> to emit bytes with MSB to LSB per uint32&#95;t ordering.

For example, the first byte will be placed in Vec&#91;3&#93;, and the following bytes will be placed in 2, 1, 0, 7, 6, 5, 4, 11, 10, 9, 8, and so on.

Definition at line 28 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/lib/target/arm/mctargetdesc/armunwindopasm-cpp">ARMUnwindOpAsm.cpp</a>.
